name: Viktor the Nth
description: This game was made during the Global Game Jam 2012, the theme was Ouroboros. The player controls one character at a time, and tries to brave the world ahead of him. But it's a race against time and traps and beasts and obstacles, challenges which ultimately prove impossible for a lone person. But persistence and teamwork pays off. This is a 2D platform/medroidvania game about how a family generation work to improve the lives of the next.
